13#define ITEM_FIRST_OFFSET 17
14#define ITEM_NEXT_OFFSET 4
15#define ITEM_HEIGHT 14
16#define ITEM_WIDTH 64
17#define BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN 6
18
19struct ButtonMenuItem {
20 const char* label;
21 int32_t index;
22 ButtonMenuItemCallback callback;
23 ButtonMenuItemType type;
24 void* callback_context;
25};
26
27ARRAY_DEF(ButtonMenuItemArray, ButtonMenuItem, M_POD_OPLIST);
28
29struct ButtonMenu {
30 View* view;
31 bool freeze_input;
32};
33
34typedef struct {
35 ButtonMenuItemArray_t items;
36 size_t position;
37 const char* header;
38} ButtonMenuModel;
39
40static void button_menu_draw_control_button(
41 Canvas* canvas,
42 uint8_t item_position,
43 const char* text,
44 bool selected) {
45 furi_assert(canvas);
46 furi_assert(text);
47
48 uint8_t item_x = 0;
49 uint8_t item_y = ITEM_FIRST_OFFSET + (item_position * (ITEM_HEIGHT + ITEM_NEXT_OFFSET));
50
51 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
52
53 if(selected) {
54 elements_slightly_rounded_box(canvas, item_x, item_y, ITEM_WIDTH, ITEM_HEIGHT);
55 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
56 }
57 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
58 canvas,
59 item_x + (ITEM_WIDTH / 2),
60 item_y + (ITEM_HEIGHT / 2),
61 AlignCenter,
62 AlignCenter,
63 text);
64}
65
66static void button_menu_draw_common_button(
67 Canvas* canvas,
68 uint8_t item_position,
69 const char* text,
70 bool selected) {
71 furi_assert(canvas);
72 furi_assert(text);
73
74 uint8_t item_x = 0;
75 uint8_t item_y = ITEM_FIRST_OFFSET + (item_position * (ITEM_HEIGHT + ITEM_NEXT_OFFSET));
76
77 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
78
79 if(selected) {
80 canvas_draw_rbox(canvas, item_x, item_y, ITEM_WIDTH, ITEM_HEIGHT, 5);
81 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorWhite);
82 } else {
83 canvas_draw_rframe(canvas, item_x, item_y, ITEM_WIDTH, ITEM_HEIGHT, 5);
84 }
85
86 FuriString* disp_str;
87 disp_str = furi_string_alloc_set(text);
88 elements_string_fit_width(canvas, disp_str, ITEM_WIDTH - 6);
89
90 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
91 canvas,
92 item_x + (ITEM_WIDTH / 2),
93 item_y + (ITEM_HEIGHT / 2),
94 AlignCenter,
95 AlignCenter,
96 furi_string_get_cstr(disp_str));
97
98 furi_string_free(disp_str);
99}
100
101static void button_menu_view_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
102 furi_assert(canvas);
103 furi_assert(_model);
104
105 ButtonMenuModel* model = (ButtonMenuModel*)_model;
106 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
107
108 const size_t active_screen = model->position / BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN;
109 const size_t items_size = ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items);
110 const size_t max_screen = items_size ? (items_size - 1) / BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN : 0;
111
112 if(active_screen > 0) {
113 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 28, 1, &I_InfraredArrowUp_4x8);
114 }
115
116 if(max_screen > active_screen) {
117 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, 28, 123, &I_InfraredArrowDown_4x8);
118 }
119
120 if(model->header) {
121 FuriString* disp_str;
122 disp_str = furi_string_alloc_set(model->header);
123 elements_string_fit_width(canvas, disp_str, ITEM_WIDTH - 6);
124 canvas_draw_str_aligned(
125 canvas, 32, 10, AlignCenter, AlignCenter, furi_string_get_cstr(disp_str));
126 furi_string_free(disp_str);
127 }
128
129 size_t item_position = 0;
130 ButtonMenuItemArray_it_t it;
131
132 for(ButtonMenuItemArray_it(it, model->items); !ButtonMenuItemArray_end_p(it);
133 ButtonMenuItemArray_next(it), ++item_position) {
134 if(active_screen == (item_position / BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN)) {
135 if(ButtonMenuItemArray_cref(it)->type == ButtonMenuItemTypeControl) {
136 button_menu_draw_control_button(
137 canvas,
138 item_position % BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN,
139 ButtonMenuItemArray_cref(it)->label,
140 (item_position == model->position));
141 } else if(ButtonMenuItemArray_cref(it)->type == ButtonMenuItemTypeCommon) {
142 button_menu_draw_common_button(
143 canvas,
144 item_position % BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN,
145 ButtonMenuItemArray_cref(it)->label,
146 (item_position == model->position));
147 }
148 }
149 }
150}
151
152static void button_menu_process_up(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
153 furi_assert(button_menu);
154
155 with_view_model(
156 button_menu->view,
157 ButtonMenuModel * model,
158 {
159 if(model->position > 0) {
160 model->position--;
161 } else {
162 model->position = ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items) - 1;
163 }
164 },
165 true);
166}
167
168static void button_menu_process_down(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
169 furi_assert(button_menu);
170
171 with_view_model(
172 button_menu->view,
173 ButtonMenuModel * model,
174 {
175 if(model->position < (ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items) - 1)) {
176 model->position++;
177 } else {
178 model->position = 0;
179 }
180 },
181 true);
182}
183
184static void button_menu_process_right(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
185 furi_assert(button_menu);
186
187 with_view_model(
188 button_menu->view,
189 ButtonMenuModel * model,
190 {
191 if(ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items) > BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN) {
192 size_t position_candidate = model->position + BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN;
193 position_candidate -= position_candidate % BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN;
194 if(position_candidate < (ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items))) {
195 model->position = position_candidate;
196 } else {
197 model->position = 0;
198 }
199 }
200 },
201 true);
202}
203
204static void button_menu_process_left(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
205 furi_assert(button_menu);
206
207 with_view_model(
208 button_menu->view,
209 ButtonMenuModel * model,
210 {
211 if(ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items) > BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN) {
212 size_t position_candidate;
213 if(model->position < BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN) {
214 position_candidate = (ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items) - 1);
215 } else {
216 position_candidate = model->position - BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN;
217 };
218 position_candidate -= position_candidate % BUTTONS_PER_SCREEN;
219 model->position = position_candidate;
220 }
221 },
222 true);
223}
224
225static void button_menu_process_ok(ButtonMenu* button_menu, InputType type) {
226 furi_assert(button_menu);
227
228 ButtonMenuItem* item = NULL;
229
230 with_view_model(
231 button_menu->view,
232 ButtonMenuModel * model,
233 {
234 if(model->position < (ButtonMenuItemArray_size(model->items))) {
235 item = ButtonMenuItemArray_get(model->items, model->position);
236 }
237 },
238 false);
239
240 if(item) {
241 if(item->type == ButtonMenuItemTypeControl) {
242 if(type == InputTypeShort) {
243 if(item->callback) {
244 item->callback(item->callback_context, item->index, type);
245 }
246 }
247 }
248 if(item->type == ButtonMenuItemTypeCommon) {
249 if((type == InputTypePress) || (type == InputTypeRelease)) {
250 if(item->callback) {
251 item->callback(item->callback_context, item->index, type);
252 }
253 }
254 }
255 }
256}
257
258static bool button_menu_view_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
259 furi_assert(event);
260
261 ButtonMenu* button_menu = context;
262 bool consumed = false;
263
264 if(event->key == InputKeyOk) {
265 if((event->type == InputTypeRelease) || (event->type == InputTypePress)) {
266 consumed = true;
267 button_menu->freeze_input = (event->type == InputTypePress);
268 button_menu_process_ok(button_menu, event->type);
269 } else if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
270 consumed = true;
271 button_menu_process_ok(button_menu, event->type);
272 }
273 }
274
275 if(!button_menu->freeze_input &&
276 ((event->type == InputTypeRepeat) || (event->type == InputTypeShort))) {
277 switch(event->key) {
278 case InputKeyUp:
279 consumed = true;
280 button_menu_process_up(button_menu);
281 break;
282 case InputKeyDown:
283 consumed = true;
284 button_menu_process_down(button_menu);
285 break;
286 case InputKeyRight:
287 consumed = true;
288 button_menu_process_right(button_menu);
289 break;
290 case InputKeyLeft:
291 consumed = true;
292 button_menu_process_left(button_menu);
293 break;
294 default:
295 break;
296 }
297 }
298
299 return consumed;
300}
301
302View* button_menu_get_view(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
303 furi_assert(button_menu);
304 return button_menu->view;
305}
306
307void button_menu_reset(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
308 furi_assert(button_menu);
309
310 with_view_model(
311 button_menu->view,
312 ButtonMenuModel * model,
313 {
314 ButtonMenuItemArray_reset(model->items);
315 model->position = 0;
316 model->header = NULL;
317 },
318 true);
319}
320
321void button_menu_set_header(ButtonMenu* button_menu, const char* header) {
322 furi_assert(button_menu);
323
324 with_view_model(
325 button_menu->view, ButtonMenuModel * model, { model->header = header; }, true);
326}
327
328ButtonMenuItem* button_menu_add_item(
329 ButtonMenu* button_menu,
330 const char* label,
331 int32_t index,
332 ButtonMenuItemCallback callback,
333 ButtonMenuItemType type,
334 void* callback_context) {
335 ButtonMenuItem* item = NULL;
336 furi_assert(label);
337 furi_assert(button_menu);
338
339 with_view_model(
340 button_menu->view,
341 ButtonMenuModel * model,
342 {
343 item = ButtonMenuItemArray_push_new(model->items);
344 item->label = label;
345 item->index = index;
346 item->type = type;
347 item->callback = callback;
348 item->callback_context = callback_context;
349 },
350 true);
351
352 return item;
353}
354
355ButtonMenu* button_menu_alloc(void) {
356 ButtonMenu* button_menu = malloc(sizeof(ButtonMenu));
357 button_menu->view = view_alloc();
358 view_set_orientation(button_menu->view, ViewOrientationVertical);
359 view_set_context(button_menu->view, button_menu);
360 view_allocate_model(button_menu->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(ButtonMenuModel));
361 view_set_draw_callback(button_menu->view, button_menu_view_draw_callback);
362 view_set_input_callback(button_menu->view, button_menu_view_input_callback);
363
364 with_view_model(
365 button_menu->view,
366 ButtonMenuModel * model,
367 {
368 ButtonMenuItemArray_init(model->items);
369 model->position = 0;
370 model->header = NULL;
371 },
372 true);
373
374 button_menu->freeze_input = false;
375 return button_menu;
376}
377
378void button_menu_free(ButtonMenu* button_menu) {
379 furi_assert(button_menu);
380
381 with_view_model(
382 button_menu->view,
383 ButtonMenuModel * model,
384 { ButtonMenuItemArray_clear(model->items); },
385 true);
386 view_free(button_menu->view);
387 free(button_menu);
388}
389
390void button_menu_set_selected_item(ButtonMenu* button_menu, uint32_t index) {
391 furi_assert(button_menu);
392
393 with_view_model(
394 button_menu->view,
395 ButtonMenuModel * model,
396 {
397 size_t item_position = 0;
398 ButtonMenuItemArray_it_t it;
399 for(ButtonMenuItemArray_it(it, model->items); !ButtonMenuItemArray_end_p(it);
400 ButtonMenuItemArray_next(it), ++item_position) {
401 if((uint32_t)ButtonMenuItemArray_cref(it)->index == index) {
402 model->position = item_position;
403 break;
404 }
405 }
406 },
407 true);
408}
